casebody.data:
GEORGE T. STEARNS, Respondent, v. CYRUS W. FIELD, Appellant.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Fbeedman and Tbuax, JJ.

Decided April 4, 1881. ■ Appeal from judgment entered on verdict against defendant. Dorsheimer, Bacon & Deyo, for appellant. Barlow & Olney, attorneys, and Francis O. Bar-» low, of counsel, for respondent; Peb Cubiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
